text:
ITALIA PRIZE
INTERNATIONAL COMPETITION FOR RADIO WORKS
FOUNDED AT CAPRI IN 1948
STATUTE
DRAWN UP ON SEPTEMBER 18TH, 1948 BY THE CONSTITUTIVE ASSEMBLY HELD AT CAPRI.
AMENDED BY THE GENERAL ASSEMBLY HELD AT VENICE ON SEPTEMBER 29TH, 1949,
BY THE GENERAL ASSEMBLY HELD AT NAPLES ON OCTOBER 13TH, 1951
AND SUCCESSIVELY BY THE GENERAL ASSEMBLY AT MILAN ON OCTOBER 9TH, 1952
